function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate urban planning leading to high population density in confined spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementation of urban planning strategies to control population density and improve ventilation in confined spaces","Technologies":"Urban design software, ventilation systems","People":"Inhabitants, urban planners, architects","Owner":"Urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for virus transmission in interior spaces","Impact":"Higher susceptibility for aerosol contamination and virus transmission","Mitigation":"Careful planning of confined spaces, implementation of ventilation and air filtration systems","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air filtration systems","People":"Architects, building planners, building owners","Owner":"Building planners, building owners"}]}
